entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain or snow and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
